text: Esbjerg Airport () is a small airport located 5 nautical miles (9.2 km) northeast of Esbjerg, Denmark. The airport was opened on April 4, 1971. ==Airlines and destinations== The following airlines operate regular flights at the airport: {{Airport-dest-list | DAT |Stavanger Seasonal: Aberdeen |Loganair |Aberdeen }} == References == Category:Airports in Denmark
title: Esbjerg Airport
